channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Gymnast who sparked abuse inquiry into coach at elite US academy says she 'needed to speak out'
A Ukrainian startup develops long-range drones and missiles to take the battle to Russia
Ukraine’s answer to Russia’s drone blitz
‘Condescending P***k’: JD Vance’s Zelenskyy-Oval Office Anecdote Backfires Online
Netanyahu escalates attack on Australia's Albanese as Jewish group urges calm
Oregon man pleads guilty following fatal crash with college softball team bus
item.description: An Oregon man has pleaded guilty to two counts of second-degree manslaughter following a fatal crash with a community college softball team

item.title: Reporter says former aide to New York City Mayor Eric Adams gave her a chip bag filled with cash
item.description: A New York City reporter says a former aide to Mayor Eric Adams gave her a potato chip bag filled with cash following a campaign event

item.title: Hurricane Erin stirs up strong winds, floods part of main highway as it creeps along the East Coast
